alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 3:55AM CST until January 03 at 4:45AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in eastern Arkansas... St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 445 AM CST. * At 355 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holly Grove, or 8 miles east of Clarendon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Marianna, Madison, Palestine, Caldwell, Colt, Wheatley, Widener, Moro, Rondo, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, Brickeys, New Salem, Cody, New Castle, Soudan, Vineyard and Ball Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for eastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for eastern Arkansas.
